title: Red Cliff
marks: Signature and Seal L edge: [ 梅逸山本亮寫 ]
description: large cliff with foliage, vines, and waterfall; small open-walled structure at UL; covered boat with passengers at LR; moon rising at UR
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Col. Peter and Mrs Betty Peabody
